comments.author: Haley Contreras

comments.text:
Does anyone have the same feeling?
To me, Universal makes me want to see the stuff the movie is based off of.
Every time I go to Universal Studios, here are the movies I want so see:
The Mummy and The Mummy Returns (Never saw the 3rd one)
The Simpsons Movie
Jurassic Park 1 and 2, maybe even 3.
Transformers 1 and 3, and even 4 that's coming soon. (Definitely not 2)
Despicable Me 1 and 2
Jaws
King Kong
1930s - 1940s classic Horror films﻿
